author: stsp
msg: Fix issue #3315, "Help for `svn switch --relocate` is incomplete/misleading"
(svn_cl__cmd_table): Improve help output for 'svn switch' by providing
an explanation of the expected parameters. Also give some examples.

author: stsp
msg: * STATUS: Amend entry for r37827. Solaris has a different problem.

author: stsp
msg: Hopefully fix issue #3347, "svn never times out when (public) IP changes".
(sock_read_cb): For some unspecified reason this function explicitly
set the timeout of the socket to infinity before reading from it.
This can cause all sorts of problems. For example, this makes
clients hang forever if they are behind a NAT and the public IP
changes while an svn protocol session is in progress, which is what
issue #3347 is about. But I could list many more problematic scenarios
like crashing routers and wireless lans near a microwave oven etc.
So just let the socket time out.
